import React from 'react' import { Header, Image, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class HeaderText extends Component { state = { modalOpen: false } handleOpen = () => this.setState({ modalOpen: true }) handleClose = () => this.setState({ modalOpen: false }) render(){ return(
Show Modal} open={this.state.modalOpen} onClose={this.handleClose} basic size='small' >
)} }
